property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the battle zone, destroy one of your creatures. Then, your opponent chooses 2 of their creatures and destroys them. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. When this creature attacks, play rock-paper-scissors with your opponent. If you win, this creature gains "Triple Breaker". When this creature is destroyed, play rock-paper-scissors with your opponent. If you win, return this creature to your hand instead of putting it in the graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. When this creature attacks, you may destroy any number of your own creatures. For each creature destroyed this creature gets +3000 power and breaks an additional shield. You may untap this creature at the end of your turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. [Blocker] Blocker When this creature is put into the battle zone, you may put the top 4 cards of your deck into your mana zone. At the end of your turn, put one card from your mana zone into your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Evolution: Put on one of your multi-colored creatures. When this creature attacks your opponent and isn't blocked, draw 3 cards, your opponent discards 3 cards at random, and you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures with 6000 power or less. Triple Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you have no shields, this creature gains "Speed Attacker". When your last shield is broken, before you break that shield destroy one of your opponent's creatures with 4000 power or less. When your last shield is put into your graveyard, before you put that shield into your graveyard destroy one of your opponent's creatures of 4000 power or less. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Evolution: Put on 1 of your multi-colored creatures. When this creature attacks, you may tap or untap 1 non-evolution creature in the battle zone. (Choose what you are attacking before you choose what creature to tap or untap.) Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. When your opponent would win the game by a creature attack, you may put the top 10 cards of your deck into your graveyard. If you do, the opponent does not win.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Overdrive Light x 2 Darkness x 2 Nature x 1 (When this creature is summoned, you may tap an additional 2 Light, 2 Darkness, 1 Nature, or any combination of these cards in your mana zone. If you do, this creature gains the following [OD] abilities) [OD] Light: When this creature is put into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck face-down into your shield zone. [OD] Darkness: When this creature is put into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's tapped creatures. [OD] Nature: When this creature is put into the battle zone, during this turn one of your creatures gets +7000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your opponent's turn, all your other creatures get +2000 power. God Link - Dokkoi, Fantasy God While this creature is linked, it has "Double Breaker". When this creature is linked and attacks, you may tap one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. If you do, this creature breaks one of your opponent's shields. (First choose what you are attacking before you choose which creature to tap.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature can't be blocked by creatures with less power than this creature. God Link - Orphe, Punishment God When this creature is linked, return all of your opponent's creatures with 2000 or less power to its owner's hand. While this creature is linked it has "Double Breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Search your deck. Choose 1 God from it and show your opponent. Then, shuffle your deck and put the chosen card on top.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature is destroyed, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature and all your creatures that share a race with this creature gain "Slayer". God Link - Tauros, Battle God (If the specified god is in the battle zone, you may link this to it. The linked god gains each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature leaves the battle zone, select 1 side instead.) While this creature is linked, it gains "Double Breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the start of your turn, put one card from your mana zone into your graveyard. Double Breaker God Link - Paloro, God of the Cycle- (If the specified god is in the battle zone, you may link this to it. The linked god gains each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature leaves the battle zone, select 1 side instead.) While this creature is linked it gains "Triple Breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy 1 multi-colored creature of cost 4 or less, or destroy 1 non-multi-colored creature of cost 6 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your return cards from your graveyard to your hand, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. God Link - Riki, Thunder God (If the specified god is in the battle zone, you may link this to it. The linked god gains each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature leaves the battle zone, select 1 side instead.) While this creature is linked, it has "Double Breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the battle zone, you may return 1 God from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. God Link - Izana, Crime God (If the specified god is in the battle zone, you may link this to it. The linked god gains each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature leaves the battle zone, select 1 side instead.) While this creature is linked, it gains "Blocker" and all your opponents get -1000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature is put into the mana zone tapped. God Link - Gou, Spirit God While this creature is linked, at the start of your turn you may return a light, fire, or nature spell from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature is put into the mana zone tapped. When this creature or one of your creatures that shares a race with this creature attacks your opponent and isn't blocked, during this turn that creature breaks an additional shield. God Link - Gort, God of Sealing While this creature is linked, it gains "Power Attacker +4000".

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. During your turn, all of your other creatures get +2000 power. God Link - Otto, Worldly God (If the specified god is in the battle zone, you may link this to it. The linked god gains each god's characteristics (power and abilities) and becomes one creature. When the linked creature leaves the battle zone, select 1 side instead.) While this creature is linked, each time one of your opponent's creatures is tapped you may draw 1 card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. When cards are put into your graveyard from you mana zone, you may instead return them to your hand. God Link - Aloro, War God When this creature wins a battle while linked, you may put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players. When this creature is destroyed, search your deck. You may choose 1 spell with "Shield Trigger" and add it to your hand after you show it to your opponent. Then, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Overdrive Water x 1 Nature x 1 (When this creature is summoned, you may tap an additional 1 Water, 1 Nature, or any combination of these cards in your mana zone. If you do, this creature gains the following [OD] abilities). [OD] Water: When this creature is put into the battle zone, return a creature in the battle zone with cost 3 or less to its owner's hand. [OD] Nature: When this creature is put into the battle zone, you may put a creature with cost 3 or less into the battle zone from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may add a card from your hand to your shields face down. If you do, choose one of your shields and put it into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw 2 cards and show them to your opponent. If at least 1 of them is a multi-colored card, draw an additional card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Discard 1 card at random from your opponent's hand. If that card isn't a multi-colored card, you may return a multi-colored creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Overdrive Darkness x 1 Nature x 1 (When this creature is summoned, you may tap an additional 1 Darkness, 1 Nature, or any combination of these cards in your mana zone. If you do, this creature gains the following [OD] abilities). [OD] Darkness: When you put this creature into the battle zone choose one of your opponent's creatures. During this turn, it gets -2000 power. [OD] Nature: When you put this creature into the battle zone, during this turn one of your creatures gets +2000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your multi-colored cards are put into the mana zone untapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Show your opponent 1 card in your hand. If that card is a nature card search your deck. You may put a creature with a cost of 3 or less into the battle zone from your deck. Then, shuffle your deck. If that card is a fire card, 1 creature in your battle zone gains "Speed Attacker" during this turn. If that card is a light card, at the end of this turn you may untap 1 of your creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Saver: God (When a God would be destroyed, you may destroy this creature instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. This creature and all creatures that share a civilization with this creature can't be attacked or blocked. Double Breaker

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped. Power Attacker +4000 At the end of your turn, you may untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This card is put into the mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: This card is put into the battle zone tapped. When this creature is put into the battle zone, all of your creatures gain "Slayer" and "Speed Attacker" until the end of this turn. During this turn, when your creatures are destroyed, they are put into the mana zone instead of the graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players. At the end of your turn, you may untap all your water and nature creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players. When your opponent has no multi-colored creatures in the battle zone, this creature gets +4000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} Tap one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone, then untap one of your multi-colored cards in either your battle zone or mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: On your opponent's next turn destroy the first non-light creature that attacks.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Overdrive Light x 1 Darkness x 2 (When this creature is summoned, you may tap an additional 1 Light, 2 Darkness, or any combination of these cards in your mana zone. If you do, this creature gains the following [OD] abilities). [OD] Light: When you put this creature into the battle zone, return a spell from your graveyard to your hand. [OD] Darkness: When you put this creature into the battle zone, return a creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature can't be blocked or attacked by any creature that shares a civilization with a creature in your battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use this [Tap] ability. [Tap]: Choose one creature in your battle zone. That creature has an additional civilization added to it during this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return a light, darkness, fire, or nature card from your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Overdrive Water x 1 Fire x 2 (When this creature is summoned, you may tap an additional 1 Water, 2 Fire, or any combination of these cards in your mana zone. If you do, this creature gains the following [OD] abilities). [OD] Water: When this creature is put into the battle zone, tap one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. [OD] Fire: When this creature is put into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's tapped creatures with 4000 power or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use this [Tap] ability. [Tap]: Choose a civilization other than the darkness civilization. All creatures of that civilization gain "Slayer".

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] Blocker This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures. Then, if your opponent's graveyard doesn't have 2 or more civilization in it, your opponent chooses 1 card from their hand and discards it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put a darkness or nature creature into the battle zone, this creature gets "Power Attacker +5000" until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When this creature is put into the battle zone, you may untap one of your multi-colored cards in either the battle zone or the mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses a card in your hand. Show that card, and if it's a multi-colored card this creature gains "Speed Attacker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy one of your opponent's creatures with 5000 power or less. Return 1 card in your mana zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Overdrive Light x 1 Fire x 1 (When this creature is summoned, you may tap an additional 1 Light, 1 Fire, or any combination of these cards in your mana zone. If you do, this creature gains the following [OD] abilities). [OD] Light: During this turn, 1 creature in your battle zone has all abilities that would prevent it from attacking negated. (This includes summoning sickness.) [OD] Fire: When this creature is put into the battle zone, one of your creatures gains "Double Breaker" during this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you have at least 1 light or fire creature in the battle zone, this creature gets +5000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: One of your creatures in the battle zone gets +2000 power for each civilization it has. Draw 1 card.
